# Load data

```{r}
vietnam = world[world$name_long == "Vietnam", ]
# Add fill layer to nz shape
tm_shape(vietnam) +
  tm_fill() 
# Add border layer to nz shape
tm_shape(vietnam) +
  tm_borders() 
# Add fill and border layers to nz shape
tm_shape(vietnam) +
  tm_fill() +
  tm_borders() 
```
